Title: Tracking Beacons
Description:
Adds tracking beacons to the game, which can be used to keep track of the location of objects and creatures even as they move around the world.

Source: https://github.com/kernelmethod/QudMods/tree/main/TrackingBeacons

[h2]New items[/h2]

This mod adds the [b]magnetic tracking beacon[/b] item to the game, which can be attached to any metal creature or object.

It also adds the [b]tracking beacon injector[/b] item, which can be injected into organic creatures or objects.

The location of an object with an attached tracker will continue to be tracked even if the object gets sucked into a space-time vortex or is otherwise lost.

Beacons can be applied to targets (with their consent) or forcibly by equipping them into your main hand. Beacons are destroyed by electromagnetic pulses.
